{"id":1312262679,"question_id":3468,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1720319602,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1312262679/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Encrypted String","memory":"8.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string getEncryptedString(string s, int k) {\n        //For each character c in s, replace c with the kth character after c in the string (in a cyclic manner).\n        int sz = s.length();\n        string ans = \"\";\n        for(int i=0; i<sz; i++) {\n            ans += s[(i+k)%sz];\n        }\n        return ans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-encrypted-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
